projects.title: developer

works.description: During my internship, I developed and maintained a web server using NestJS to manage and process real-time data for a taxi location tracking system. I contributed to building the backend architecture, integrating APIs, and optimizing data flow to track and display taxi locations in real-time. This experience enhanced my skills in server-side development, working with databases, and utilizing WebSocket for live data updates.

Worked remotely as a backend developer, collaborating closely with senior engineers to develop and maintain a microservice architecture (MSA) using NestJS, TypeScript, Redis, and Docker. Focused on improving performance and reliability, while gaining experience with Atlassian tools for task management and team coordination.

Founded a startup with friends, gaining hands-on experience in building and scaling a product. Worked remotely as a backend developer at Reponse App, a privacy-focused chat platform. Developed and maintained microservices using NestJS, TypeScript, Fastify, and Docker. Led public relations and marketing efforts to increase brand awareness and user acquisition. Also served as Team Leader and handled Project Management.
